Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
RightToLeft
Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Rock
public class Weapon extends RightToLeft
Contains all standard methods used by the weapon.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    Weapon​(bagel.Image weapon, Weapon.WEAPON_TYPE type, PipeSet pipeSet)
    The Weapon constructor used as a super constructor for bombs and rocks to create a weapon object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon​(bagel.Image weapon, Weapon.WEAPON_TYPE type, PipeSet pipeSet)
      The Weapon constructor used as a super constructor for bombs and rocks to create a weapon object.
      Parameters:
      weapon - An Image object containing the weapon in context
      type - The specific type of weapon required, available from WEAPON_TYPE enum
      pipeSet - The pipe set after which this particular weapon has been spawned

  • Method Details

    • setInitialPosition

      public bagel.util.Point setInitialPosition​(PipeSet pipeSet)
      Sets the initial position of the weapon at a random location between pipe sets
      Parameters:
      pipeSet - The pipe set after which the weapon is initialised
      Returns:
      The initialized random point for the weapon

    • checkPickUp

      public boolean checkPickUp​(Bird bird)
      Checks whether the weapon has been picked up by bird
      Parameters:
      bird - The bird in play
      Returns:
      Returns true if the bird has picked up the weapon

    • checkOutOfRange

      public boolean checkOutOfRange()
      Check if the fired weapon is out of range (in frames)
      Returns:
      Returns true if out-of-range

    • checkDestruction

      public boolean checkDestruction​(PipeSet pipeSet)
      Check if weapon has destroyed pipe when shot
      Parameters:
      pipeSet - The pipe set the weapon has shot at
      Returns:
      Returns true if pipe and weapon intersect

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition​(bagel.util.Point birdPosition, double width)
      Updates the position of the weapon when picked up bird or shot
      Parameters:
      birdPosition - The current position of the bird
      width - The width of the bird

    • shootWeapon

      public void shootWeapon()
      Update properties of weapon from picked to shot

    • setIsShot

      public void setIsShot​(boolean isShot)
      Setter for weapon property isShot
      Parameters:
      isShot - Set true/false is weapon is shot or not

    • setIsPicked

      public void setIsPicked​(boolean isPicked)
      Setter for weapon property isPicked
      Parameters:
      isPicked - Set true/false is weapon is picked or not
